content: Veronica is a Seattle-based professional writer specializing in technical documentation, knowledge management, and AI-enhanced content management solutions.
summary: Veronica is a Seattle-based professional writer specializing in technical documentation, knowledge management, and AI-enhanced content management solutions.
title: Veronica Starovoit

content:
Amazon Advertising help center owned and maintained by Veronica Starovoit. Most content was written by her in collaboration with product managers, partner managers, and other subject matter experts. Maintained using a Middleman static site generator.
Initiatives she ran to improve it included:
 launching Japanese localization working with the UX Design team to redesign the experience  PDF can’t be displayed :(
